bibl.title: Coptic and Greek Texts Relating to the Hermopolite Monastery of Apa Apollo.
bibl.note: P. Mon. Apa Apollo 1-66. - Part I: Discussion (1. Background to the selection of the texts; - 2. Sources for the texts; - 3. Findings from the texts; - 4. Description of the texts). - Part II: The texts [1-66, 6th-9th cent.]. - Appendices. Concordances. Corrigenda. Papyri, ostraca, and inscriptions discussed. Glossary. References. Indexes.
bibl.seg: CLACKSON Sarah J., Coptic and Greek Texts Relating to the Hermopolite Monastery of Apa Apollo.
Oxford, Griffith Institute - Ashmolean Museum, 2000, 4°, xvi-187 pp., tabl., 1 carte et 48 pll. ISBN 0-900416-75-0. £60.
